name: Waffling About!
description:
Ever wanted to play as a waffle and try to be cooked? Neither have I but now you can! In Waffling About you play a waffle and jump through the levels trying your best to make it to the toaster!

Controls:

A/D  - Move left and right

Space - Jump

R - Restart level

This was made in a little 10 hour challenge when I tried to make a game within a 10 hour time limit! I'll probably update it at some point because this was pretty fun! :3
